text:
I get the following error when trying to use the style task with xalan:
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/xalan/xslt/XSLTProcessorFactory
This class has been deprecated and is no longer included in the Xalan 
distribution.
creator: jim.azeltine@indus.com

text: For Xalan2 you must set processort to trax, not to xalan.  "xalan" is Xalan-J-1.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
